channel.title: Blogrolls on exo-cortex: weblog
channel.description: Recent content in Blogrolls on exo-cortex: weblog

item.title: blogroll
item.description: other cool blogs from friends: https://effekthasch.org/avs/blog/ this blog from grandchild is documenting the progress of updating/porting the awesome and ancient Winamp-plugin “Advanced Visualization Studio”. I https://lindemax.github.io/ here lindeMAX is writing about signal processing math, pcb design, linux and climbing huge mountains. Sometimes about cool new tricks about hugo. https://music.seba-geek.de/ sebageek started making music with and learning about various music production tools recently. He started a dedicated blog documenting the cool short audio-loops.
